name: Grand Doggy Purps
description: Grand Doggy Purps, or more formerly Grand Doggy Purple, is an indica-dominant hybrid cross between Granddaddy Purple and a Chemdawg phenotype known as Chemdawg D. Bred by Connoisseur Seeds, this hybrid inherits an aromatic fusion of sweet grape and sour skunk. Though mostly indica, this strain's effects are lifted by cerebral energy, allowing focus and productivity in spite of its indica potency.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Focused, Creative, Happy, Uplifted, Pain, Stress, Depression, Inflammation, Muscle Spasms, Dry Mouth, Anxious, Paranoid, Dry Eyes, Dizzy
